data.title: Lovely place for a great dinner or drinks and an apetizer
data.text:
This is always a tough place to get into and for good reason.  We tried this place for restaurant week and reservations were limited a week in advance and on a Monday no less.  That speaks for the great reputation this place has.  

They did not disappoint anyone in my party.  Everything was great from the Caesar salad for an appetizer to the perfectly seasoned cooked NY steak, to the wonderful brown sugar apple cake for desert.  Along the way we enjoyed a perfectly cooked medley of vegetables seasoned perfectly, and some fantastic Brussels sprouts which I normally don't like, but were amazing here.  

Service was impeccable, and friendly and we felt very welcome from start to finish.   We will be looking forward to a return trip to this great Santa Cruz restaurant fixture.

data.title: What a great Bar.
data.text: we went in for a drink before dinner, It's Red alright. The Gin and Tonic I had was spectacular and I had to have a second. The bar tender was perfect and we had a great time for the 45 minutes we were there. If your in Santa Cruz and want to get a great G and T at a place with a lot of character then this is your place.

data.title: Retro Funky and Fun
data.text: Hung out with some drinks and appetizers with a group of fellow workshop-goers one afternoon in Santa Cruz.  It was a quiet place in the mid-afternoon though I am sure more lively in evening.  Shabby chic decor and a good place for a group to hang for awhile!

data.title: A really fun bar in downtown.
data.text: I love going here in October because they go all out decorating for Halloween. Usually very crowded on the weekends.

data.title: Went twice in 2 days, it's that good!
data.text: I was only in town for a few days and I ended up going to Red a room twice because I loved the bar that much! Super cool setting upstairs and nice and helpful bartenders. Sweet spot!

data.title: Good food, good drinks and hangout
data.text:
What else can you ask for? The Red is a local's hangout and sometimes it does get crazy but there are no limits of what you can find in here. 

The food is good, I've come here late and hungry and their fries are delicious. Some nights the music and the UCSC kids are too much but if you don't mind that then it's all good.

data.title: Cool red ambiance, very small, not friendly
data.text: It was OK, we went, had two drinks and left. We got a cool photo though. The whole place is lit with red lights.  Santa Cruz down town is kinda depressing to me.  You can take the trolley bus from the beach for a quarter each way.  That was the best part.

data.title: Wonderful gem in Santa Cruz
data.text: Wonderful restaurant and lounge located in downtown Santa Cruz. Very reasonably priced. Nice jazz trio playing. Love the ambience.  The lounge area has a real relaxing and comfortable feel. Excellent service.  The fried chicken, soft shell crab, and Brussels sprouts chips were delicious.  At $9, the cocktails were reasonably priced for what you got.  The pomegranate mojito hit the spot.

data.title: Great atmosphere!
data.text: We went to the Red Room for cocktails on the evening we arrived. The atmosphere was very dark and comfy, with over stuffed chairs and plenty of seating. The bar service was great and I recommend the Jane Grey cocktail, featuring Earl Grey tea flavors. Very nice!

data.title: Excellent
data.text:
Le staff est juste super et l'ambiance vraiment cool et rétro 
Un choix de bière impressionnant avec une Care pour dîner. 
Et si vous ne trouvez pas ce qu'il vous faut ils vont même cherche les meilleurs plats de la ville dans d'autres restos 
C'est simple quand tu t'installe tu ne repars pas avant de vouloir rentrer dormir
